# COVID-19 Incident Risk Assessment Dashboard

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of ciraDash is to provide incident commanders with a tool to analyze and discuss
COVID-19 risks within and around fire camps.

## Installation

You can install the latest version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools") # Install R devtools if you have not already
devtools::install_github("jakedilliott/cira_dashboard")
```
## Example

You can run the CIRA dashboard locally with:

```{r example, eval=FALSE}
library(ciraDash)
ciraDash::launch_ciraDash()
```
